SELECT SEQ_RECIPE_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into R_BOARD values (#{postNo}, #{memberNo}, #{title}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{category}, #{serving}, #{difficulty}, #{reqTime}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT POST_NO, R.MEMBER_NO, TITLE, R.CREATE_DATE, R.MODIFY_DATE, CATEGORY, SERVING, DIFFICULTY, REQTIME, HIT, AVG(L.RATING) AS RATE FROM R_BOARD R LEFT OUTER JOIN REPLY L ON(BOARD_NO = 1 AND TARGET_NO = POST_NO AND L.MEMBER_NO != R.MEMBER_NO) WHERE POST_NO = #{postNo} AND R.DELETED = 'N' GROUP BY POST_NO, R.MEMBER_NO, TITLE, R.CREATE_DATE, R.MODIFY_DATE, CATEGORY, SERVING, DIFFICULTY, REQTIME, HIT
SELECT POST_NO, STEP, CONTENT FROM R_STEP WHERE POST_NO = #{postNo} ORDER BY STEP ASC
SELECT MEMBER_NO, M.NICKNAME, P.CHANGE_NAME FROM R_BOARD R JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN PHOTO P ON(BOARD_NO = 0 AND TARGET_NO = MEMBER_NO AND FILE_LEVEL = 0) WHERE POST_NO = #{postNo}
SELECT POST_NO, TITLE, CHANGE_NAME FROM R_BOARD R JOIN PHOTO P ON(BOARD_NO = 1 AND TARGET_NO = POST_NO AND FILE_LEVEL = 0) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND R.DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY POST_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE PHOTO SET DELETED = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_NO = 1 AND TARGET_NO = ${postNo}

UPDATE R_BOARD SET MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}, TITLE = #{title}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE, CATEGORY = #{category}, SERVING = #{serving}, DIFFICULTY = #{difficulty}, REQTIME = #{reqTime} WHERE POST_NO = ${postNo}
